topic.title: strange, i'm not connecting to ANY tracker recently.
how to change and save setting in configuration?
Anybody has "manifesto" & video of that New Zealand shooter?
topic.body:
I want to archive these in my personal library.
I'm 1 day too late, they're all taken down everywhere.

anybody can post me bittorrent link?

1540395290_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nw.body: they don't want "the American system". they want benefit and job, they want to go to big City and live there.
"refugee" move to US the same reason you want to move to NY or LA. better job better pay better benefit

1546311592_1FnQQkQ4AwjwBhbz61RmqPazDrvdB.body: eg. I can change "Proxy for tracker connections", but there is no option to save the change! bizarre...

1552676118_1FnQQkQ4AwjwBhbz61RmqPazDrvdB.body: thank you so much ppl. XD
